name: ONI Coaching Platform
desc:
I was the sole developer contracted to produce a client management system for ONI Gym.  It gives trainers the ability to graph a client's progress against custom metrics and create bespoke exercise or nutrition plans.

This program is built using React on top of Google Firebase

name: Gamefroot
desc:
Gamefroot is an application that teaches coding to children through game development.  During my contract I rebuilt parts of the code base to be in line with modern standards, as well as updated a lot of the user interface.

This program uses React with Typescript, a Node.js backend, Google cloud, docker and kubernetes

name: SpacePants
desc:
As a final project submission for my dev course, I led a team of developers to create SpacePants, a mobile-based hidden role party game.

This program is built using React on a Node.js backend, utilising web sockets

name: Chess, For The Sophisticated
desc: One of my first projects.  Chess in pure JavaScript, with a rudimentary AI to play against

name: Untitled CLI Game
desc: As an exercise to learn C#, I created a classic command line game.  Currently there are options to gather materials and craft items, as well as a survival system involving health, stamina and temperature.
